nodes.bodyText: Rename the first argument here to codeSystemUri to indicate that it accepts an URI.

It would be great to have a few parse fail tests as well to verify the following:

Number of parts >= 3 (if not fail with reasonable error message)
Last part is not empty (if not fail with reasonable error message)
Second last part is not empty and can be parsed into a short number (if not fail with reasonable error message)

nodes.bodyText: Null to empty call is really bad here, both null and empty are invalid values for the identifier part. Don't convert it to empty here, validate instead on the other factory method.
This should throw BadRequestException or IllegalArgumentException as well.
⚠️ The new factory methods do not use the caching mechanism built into this class!
